name: Forword Rush - Action Word Game
description:
Use your fast reflexes and word building skills together in this brand new experience! The first of its kind, Forword Rush is a smart, slick, and stylish word adventure game that becomes more challenging as you progress through a variety of levels across three worlds.

Each adrenaline-pumping level is different, with new experiences at every stage. Are you quick enough, and brave enough, to blast your way to word winning triumph?

Forword Rush is brought to you by the developers of the epic word battle series: War of Words!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FORWORD RUSH FEATURES:

• Daily Challenges! Compete with players around the world with an endless supply of new challenges each day

• Huge variety of puzzles and level objectives to keep you coming back for more

• Seamless integration of social features and Game Center for tons of achievements, leaderboards, and more

• A truly unique experience unlike any game on the App Store
